document.full_text: the vancouver canucks broke away in the third period, scoring 4 goals in a rout of the san jose sharks on wednesday night and took a 2-0 lead in the western conference finals.
document.title: canucks 7, sharks 3: canucks bust out offense, rout sharks in game 2
lines_and_colors: the vancouver canucks broke away in the third period, scoring 4 goals in a rout of the san jose sharks on wednesday night and took a 2-0 lead in the western conference finals.
